title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4039.15 - Disqualification of horse before race
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4039.15 - Disqualification of horse before race

State Regulations

If an objection to a horse engaged in a race be made
not less than 15 minutes before the time set for the race, the stewards may
require the qualification to be proved before the race, and in default of such
proof being given to their satisfaction, they must declare the horse
disqualified. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9

4039.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
